A1: a VA2K Walk and Roll on May 21 from 11 a.m
RelatedSentence: of Veterans Affairs ) Health Care System will host a VA2K Walk and Roll on May 21 from 11 a.m .
Registration will take place in the main lobby of the medical center , and walkers may walk a route around the VA neighborhood .
Pre-registration is not required , and those interested in participating should plan to arrive at the main lobby no later than 12:30 p.m. to participate in the walk .

In conjunction with the event , VA is authorized to accept items for homeless veterans .
Individuals are not required to donate to participate .
